item.description:
A Pub Crawl Walk

Let's due this again. But this time let's reverse it. We'll start in Beacon Hill and walk from Beacon Hill down the Commonwealth Mall and eventually over the bridge to Harvard. Of course hitting pubs/bars along our merry way.

The first time was a blast. This time will be even better!

Please Note: Read Posts below. Thanks!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Joint Event: A Pub Crawl Walk - Beacon Hill to Harvard SQ
